overview: Identical twins Joey and Sami want a new car and they know just how to get their stepdad to do whatever they ask!  Brandi and Mandy are having a sleepover, but when Mandy's stepbrother gets caught while watching the girls pleasing themselves, the girls decide his cock is better than a pillow!  When presented with a opportunity for a threesome, Ella and Lola waste no time in ditching their boyfriend's and agree to share our stud's rock hard cock!  Desiree and Kiarra need a ride to the party but their creepy stepbrother demands that they make out with each other first; later, when he catches the girls getting frisky he offers them his cock as learning tool!
title: Twisted Threesome Tales 8
